mapper.select:
select m.id , m.user_id as userId, contract_salary as contractSalary , share_salary as shareSalary , manage_salary as manageSalary , same_level_salary as sameLevelSalary , salary , sel_date as selDate , u.user_name as userName , c.level, c.name as contractName from mdc_income m left join sys_user u on u.user_id = m.user_id left join sys_contract c on c.id = m.contract_id where m.type = 1
and m.sel_date like concat(left(#{map.selDate},10),'%')
and u.user_name like concat('%',#{map.userName},'%')
and c.type =1 and c.level = #{map.level}
order by sel_date desc , salary desc

select.foreach: select #{key} as level,ifnull(sum(if(contract_salary>#{burnValue},#{burnValue},contract_salary)),0) as totalStaticNum from mdc_income where sel_date = left(#{selDate},10) and FIND_IN_SET(user_id,#{value.ids}) and type = 1

mapper.select: select ifnull(sum(mi.number),0) as cardNumber, ifnull(sum(mi.contract_salary),0) as totalIncome from sys_user_level sul join mdc_income mi on mi.user_id = sul.reced_id and mi.sel_date = left(#{selDate},10) and mi.type = 2 where sul.rec_id = #{userId}

select ifnull(sum(if(mi.contract_salary > #{burnValue}, #{burnValue} , mi.contract_salary )),0) from mdc_income mi where mi.sel_date = left(#{selDate},10) and mi.type = 1 and user_id in ( select reced_id from sys_user_level where rec_id = #{userId} union select #{userId} )
